title: Redox-neutral, metal-free tryptophan labeling of polypeptides in hexafluoroisopropanol (HFIP)
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, 5,963-969
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00142G, Communication
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mohammad Nuruzzaman, Brandon M. Colella, Zeinab M. Nizam, Isaac JiHoon Cho, Julia Zagorski, Jun Ohata
This work translated the preceding metal-catalyzed tryptophan modification method into a metal-free process, enabling efficient labeling of peptides, proteins, and even cell lysates in hexafluoroisopropanol (HFIP).
